overview:
Claes works as the head backend engineer of space station 6.

He joins the founding team with with over 20 years of programming, technical management, and project management experience. He has been involved in multiple international startups including: Tilgin, Dynarc, Ceen Data and X-NAT. He is proficient in multiple programming languages, including Ruby on Rails, PHP, C/C++, .net, and Java. At his latest start-up, All Widgets, he help successfully develop multiple award-winning social media applications for clients including CNN, Hallmark, Mini and K2 Sports.
